p: From each sunflower head, achenes were collected and separated into either ‘fully developed’ and ‘empty’ ones (containing only the embryo sac), and subsequently each group was weighted and counted using a photoelectronic seed counter (Pfeuffer Contador). Seed set was expressed as the percentage of filled achenes over the total number of achenes. Flour humidity and oil content of each head were measured from a freshly milled random sub-sample of 5 grams of filled achenes from each flower head using near-infrared transmittance technology (FOSS Infratec ™ 1241 Grain Analyser).
